Uses of Class
org.pepstock.charba.client.items.InteractionItem

  • Packages that use InteractionItem 
    Package Description
    org.pepstock.charba.client.enums
    Contains all enumerations of some chart options where only a specific set of values can be set.
    org.pepstock.charba.client.interaction
    Contains all classes to implement a custom interactions for CHART.JS.
    org.pepstock.charba.client.items
    Contains all elements generated by CHART.JS, which are mapping java script objects, to use at runtime in plugins, events or controllers.

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      List<InteractionItem> Interactioner.invoke​(IsChart chart, ChartEventContext event, InteractionOptions options, boolean useFinalPosition)
      Returns items which must be managed by CHART.JS event or hovering handler and by tooltips.
